entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'Add argument name' refactoring works only at very beginning of attribute argument #63365
  • Add argument name refactoring on commented first arg seems to duplicate comment #63362
    Backlog
  • Add argument name refactoring on commented first arg seems to duplicate comment #63361
  • IntelliSense tooltips for large XML docs are cut and not scrollable, resulting in unreadable text #63360
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent behaviour with source generator results between unit testing and launch profile #63353
  • Tracking issue for stack overflow exception in devenv and OOP #63349
    17.4 P2
  • Building Corelib in runtime triggers several asserts #63348
    17.4

Closed

  • InvalidOperationException thrown by AbstractMoveStaticMembersRefactoringProvider #63287
  • Unexpected mutable struct copy when assigning a property of the struct #62563
    17.4
  • Roslyn crashes during source generation when using new `ForAttributeWithMetadataName` API #63318
    17.4
  • PreferBuiltInOrFrameworkTypeDiagnosticId is used in two analyzers #50307
    Backlog
  • VS 17.4 p1 Marking files as readonly #63340
  • Low level struct improvements allow saving managed pointers to structr constructors stack #63016
    17.4
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62791
    17.4
  • `ref` parameters to `ref struct` types should be `scoped ref` by default #62691
    17.4
  • Incorrect overload visible for Analyzer in OperationAction for Interpolated string handler #63231
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Constructor ordering, defaults, and overloads #63371
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Install a .NET 6 runtime for the MSBuild Workspace unit tests. #63369
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix trivia handling in 'use named arguments' refactoring #63366
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove unused GetLanguageName methods #63358
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main-vs-deps to main #63355
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.3-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #63354
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix crash in parameter refactoring #63351
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63282
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Revert "Consider types with ref fields as managed (#63209)" #63367
    Area-Compilers, 17.4
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to release/dev17.4 #63356
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • remove -vs-deps branches from publishing #63364
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • correctness build optimizations #62797
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Don't provide refactoring for VB Move Static Members when IncompleteMemberSyntax is found #63342
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow passing a reference type field by reference when spilling to temps #63345
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update the job names used in report ci times script #63343
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix generator error on command line #63347
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #61568 from CyrusNajmabadi/localFuncindexing" #63344
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Skip flaky test AnalyzerConfigDocumentOpenedClosedEvents #63352
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63350
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.4
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63346
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63372
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Change the search of local function to non-recursive version #63338
    Area-IDE
  • Integrate Lambda Default Parameters into Synthesized Delegate Types and Lowering Pass #63293
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge IBC data for .Net core binaries #61424
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Upgrade LSP version #63341
    Area-IDE
  • Fixes EnC slot mapping for certain kinds of synthesized variables lifted to state machine fields #63295
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable adding attributes to generic types #63292
    Area-IDE
  • Restore nullable warnings for unset required members from base types #63286
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • ConvertToRecord: Property and Method analysis #63320
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Track MemberNotNull for local functions #63310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Completion for .editorconfig files #63019
    Area-IDE, Community
